findings.title: Non-compete / non-solicit style restriction
findings.rationale: Restrictive covenants can limit future business activity; enforceability varies and is commonly negotiated.

4. CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE
Confidentiality obligations survive termination and continue for 2 years.

5. NON-COMPETE AND NON-SOLICITATION
Employee may not compete within the same market for 12 months after termination.

findings.title: Short termination or notice windows
findings.rationale: Short or strict notice windows can lead to accidental renewals or unintended termination.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...6. TERM AND TERMINATION This Agreement may be terminated by either party with 30 days written notice....

N-COMPETE AND NON-SOLICITATION
Employee may not compete within the same market for 12 months after termination.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION
This Agreement may be terminated by either party with 30 days written notice.

7. INDEMNIFICATION
Mutual indemnification: each party indemnifies the other for its own negligence, capped at annual salary.

8. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
Disputes shall be resolved through mediati

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...10. GOVERNING LAW This Agreement is governed by Colorado state law....
findings.context:
es shall be resolved through mediation, then litigation if mediation fails.

9. ATTORNEYS' FEES
The prevailing party in any dispute shall recover reasonable attorneys' fees.

10. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by Colorado state law.

This Agreement is effective as of May 1, 2025.

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
